item.title: *server crasher*READdicuss issues or anything to do with the freak and solve it
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

archerkill30:

This is the dumbest shit ever. Its impossible to stop ddosers, sure we can ban usernames starting with mr.qwerter ect but thats not completely stoping ddosers.

hint hint go to a certain site better then this one ot find it but im not tell good luck on your goose hunt

heres fro mthe download post from program

How does it work? Simple. It loads the MoparScape status page, and then sends the amount of threads you want it to send.

Is there a way to stop this?
Not that people know of. Some people think that IP banning you will work. Well they are wrong. The crasher sends a false login packet to the server. They can IP ban you all they want, but your crasher will still null their server to death.

Read full topic

item.title: *server crasher*READdicuss issues or anything to do with the freak and solve it
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“aftereffect, post:1, topic:150189”][quote author=Vladie link=topic=205687.msg1810822#msg1810822 date=1191839323]
How could we make it were you can’t allow multiple connections from same ip adress?
[/quote]Make it check when the client attempts to connect to the server but that would be useless if your dealing with SYI or something similar.[/quote]

it wouldn’t be useless, its not like he’s logging from 100000 different ip’s at one time. Plus ipbanning him stops him at the source, for about 5 minutes, once the ip changes, you have the code to not allow more than one connection per ip. so you can get the ip while he’s attacking add it to bannedips.txt and thats all. thats what i do, don’t even get one null.

Though i do get trouble with the silabsoft crasher…It actually goes in, but only like 3 or 5.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

newservermaker:

geting his ip isn’t easy, its a program… you cant ip ban him

You CAN get his ip. But, its like syipkpker. its dynamic, changes ip about every 5 minutes. Plus

Mr.Quarters server crasher can put different names, it won’t always be neccesarilly Syipkpker… Or Silabsoft, Or Mrquarter…

He can use whatever name he prefers, all he’s adding is the illegal characters at the end.
